string.value: The evil scheme to put #m103000000# in danger... it only turned out to be #p9020000#'s clumsiness. Let's go inform #bJM#k.
JM, numbed by the absurdity, asks you to defeat #o6220000#. He seems to have aged 10 years because of this. Poor JM...\n\n#o6220000##r#a22211##k
You have defeated #o6220000# and reported your progress to JM.

So, what did Lakelis have to say? ...She is the one responsible for all this, huh? That wretched girl! I can't believe she made the same mistake twice! As if King Slime weren't enough... now a #o6220000#? And she was going to gather adventurers to take care of it? She hasn't even taken care of the King Slime yet!! When will she learn?! \n\r#L0##b Ca.. Calm down...#k#l

Right... Right... Well, you've done well. I'm sorry you went through so much trouble because of some fool. Well, what's done is done and we can't have a monster wandering around. Will you still defeat #r#o6220000##k for us?
Sigh... The mystery of the scheme ends here.
What... you don't think you can handle it? I can't ask #p9020000# to take care of it... She'll make a big fuss about gather adventurers... What will I do?

Have you defeated #o6220000#? Woohoo~thanks. You've done so much for us! You had to hunt alligators and gather information for no good reason. I'm sorry you went through all that. I don't really have anything to offer you but to enhance your Fame.
I've learned a few lessons from all of this. Don't blow things out of proportion. Have an informant ready to collect information. Never trust #r#p9020000#.#k.. Good work.
I assume you haven't seen #o6220000# yet. You can probably find it near the swamp somewhere. Make sure you defeat this monster at once.
